title: I. Need. Help.
body: I literally can't play this game anymore. It doesn't matter who i play or where i play them i can never do good. It's starting to get annoying because i can't improve when I lane against people who actually know what they are doing and i go 1/15 and they still camp my lane. So my question is, How can I fix this? Because, frankly, I'm about to give up. I can't play another game where I would be more useful being AFK then actually playing because i don't feed when AFK. So please, help me.

replies.body:
Go watch [this dude ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLk0vqad8dXss0QGwCHTRxg)  he explains why he does everything he does . Its helped my game quite a bit , and may help you .


On a side note, sometimes , you are just bad at  a game , and nothing you do will help. Either learn to enjoy the good moments and let the bad ones pass over you like the wind, or stop playing.

find some braindead shit to play.

I love playing Kayn. But after going on a losing streak i say "fuck it. Your Up Olaf"

And I hard carry.
